GOD!!! people can actually come up with something as retarded as this.... this kappa looks like a mutant offspring of toad & ninja turtles.  People, don't waste an hour of your lives watching this garbage.

I saw this at the Bram Stoker film festival in Whitby earlier this year. It's not a film to be taken seriously, but it's meant to be a bit of a parody. If you enjoy those "so bad they're good" films then you might like this. 
Personally, I found it pretty funny and entertaining, but nothing amazing. There are a couple of scenes during the big battle near the end that made me laugh out loud though!

But yeah: Poor special effects, poor acting, ridiculous, childish script, nonsensical plot developments... but good fun if you enjoy that kinda thing.
...Oh, and for anyone who's into anime, Hideako Anno (creator of Neon Genesis Evangelion) has a cameo in this film!
